original_text: Then Solomon came from his journey to the high place that was at Gibeon to Jerusalem, from before the tabernacle of the congregation, and reigned over Israel.
korean_text: 이에 솔로몬이 기브온 산당 회막 앞에서부터 예루살렘으로 돌아와서 이스라엘을 다스렸더라

sentences.original_text: Then Solomon came from his journey
to the high place that was at Gibeon
from before the tabernacle of the congregation
